pages.text: The Spurious Thunderbolt - an elixir that greatly enhances the combat prowess of its imbiber. This potion is an invaluable ally in fierce battles, yet there is a small caveat - the recipe remains incomplete, thus there is a minor side effect: near-total blindness, lasting twice as long as the enhancement.

pages.title: Potion Crafting
pages.text: The original recipe of Spurious Thunderbolt - not recommended for archers and battle mages.
